title: 为什么我的世界mod合集玩不成
txt_content: 为什么我的世界mod合集玩不成file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1339266401/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/Q0(S@%WH0R7{I8@M_6{TD7W.jpg

replies.txt_content:
Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      

Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.
